author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A report from Windows Central claims that Microsoft might be rethinking its handheld strategy and pulling back development on a first-party Xbox handheld. Instead, they will focus on partnerships with third-party hardware manufacturers (like ASUS) to make an Xbox-licensed handheld. With the Xbox Showcase slated for next Sunday, we might learn more soon. In other news, Ubisoft might be teasing something related to Splinter Cell, after tweeting an image from the third game, Chaos Theory. Back in 2021, Ubisoft confirmed a remake of the original game was coming, but they have not said anything since. The last Splinter Cell game, Blacklist, was released back in 2013. And finally, speaking of remakes, the rumored Persona 4 remake might not bring back the original English voice cast, but no official statement has been made.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Microsoft Reportedly "Pulling Back" Development on Xbox Handheld - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Vindictus: Defying Fate trailer for the upcoming action-adventure RPG to see the characters, village, and monster fighting combat. Vindictus: Defying Fate will be available on PC, and an alpha test begins on June 8, 2025.
title: Vindictus: Defying Fate - Official Alpha Test Final Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After years working a propane job in Saudi Arabia to earn their retirement nest egg, Hank and Peggy Hill return to a changed Arlen, Texas to reconnect with old friends Dale, Boomhauer and Bill. Meanwhile, Bobby is living his dream as a chef in Dallas and enjoying his 20s with his former classmates Connie, Joseph, and Chane.

King of the Hill drops August 4th on Hulu.
title: King of the Hill - Official Season 14 Credit Sequence Reveal | Hulu

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Stellar Blade trailer for this action RPG to see gameplay, formidable enemies and get a peek at Eve's post-apocalyptic world. A 40-minute PC demo for Stellar Blade is available now on PC. Save data can be carried to the full game when it launches on PC. Stellar Blade is available now on PS5, with the Complete Edition arriving on PS5 and PC on June 11, 2025.
title: Stellar Blade - Official PC Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The bloodshed begins. Eternal Evil is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S. It is also out on PC. Check out the Eternal Evil launch trailer for this first-person survival horror game to see gameplay and terrifying enemies you'll face. Enter a decaying city overrun by vampires that grow stronger every time you fail to stop them.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Eternal Evil - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Destiny: Rising trailer for the upcoming mobile sci-fi RPG shooter game set in the Destiny universe. The new Destiny: Rising trailer shows action-packed gameplay and more. Pre-registration for Destiny: Rising is available now on iOS. A Google Play closed beta is available now (United States and Canada).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Destiny: Rising - Official Closed Beta Test Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign brings back a ton of bosses from the past, but the eight playable classes are completely new. They're also very different from one another, so it might be tricky to figure out which one is right for you. This video will explain how each class works and give some recommendations based on your play style.

Timecodes
00:00 - Intro
00:26 - Wylder
01:19 - Guardian
02:42 - Ironeye
03:55 - Raider
05:15 - Recluse
06:43 - Executor
08:21 - Duchess
09:44 - Revenant
11:01 - Outro
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Which Class Should You Play?

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Sword of Justice in this announcement trailer for the upcoming open-world multiplayer social RPG developed by ZhuRong Studio. Sword of Justice will be available on PC and mobile (iOS and Android). Pre-registration is available now.

In Sword of Justice, explore a vast open world, rich in Eastern aesthetics, where players embark on adventures through breathtaking natural landscapes. Traverse majestic mountains and flowing rivers, conquer perilous peaks and labyrinthine caverns, and uncover legendary weapons and ancient techniques. Engage in visceral combat against mythical beasts and roaming bandits, unleashing your Wuxia arts mastery to collect rare artifacts.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Sword of Justice - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay and step into the colorful world of Popucom in this launch trailer for the upcoming 3D co-op platforming adventure game. Popucom will be available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store) on June 1, 2025 (PDT). It will also be available on PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5) at a later date. 

In Popucom, venture together with your friends on an unknown planet. Use color switching, match-3 shooting, and artifact powers to overcome challenges and keep advancing. What lies ahead of you is an adventure filled with wonder, hope, and much more to discover!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Popucom - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ahead of the launch of the Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo went ahead and shook up how they present games that are purchased online through the Nintendo eShop. Virtual Game Cards are here to stay, and they bring with them a new set of features, limitations and confusing terminology. Let’s break down exactly what Virtual Game Cards are and how they work for Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 consoles.

Using Online Licence to share a game - Once you enable Online Licence as shown in the video, your other Switch can play the loaded Virtual Game Card, while your primary switch can still access the same game (after doing an online check). However, both consoles can’t launch the game at the same time while they are connected to the internet. 

If there are no online components, you can get around this by switching the wifi off (or turning on airplane mode) on the second Switch with the Loaded Virtual Game Card, as it can still access downloaded games with the Virtual Game Cards loaded.


For help wi
title: How Virtual Game Cards Work on NIntendo Switch and Switch 2

author: IGN
description: Getting your levels drained by the Pestilent Lord event? Learn exactly how to survive the Locust Swarm and recover your lost levels in this guide to one of the most punishing mechanics in Elden Ring Nightreign. We break down how the event works, how to track the swarm, and how to find and defeat the Sentient Pest boss to reclaim your strength.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - How to Deal with Locust Swarm Event (Level Stealing Boss!)

author: IGN
description:
As we approach the next generation of Nintendo, Brian Altano sits down with IGN co-founder Peer Schneider to look back at his decades-long journey covering Nintendo, from the early days to the dawn of the Switch 2. From launch events to iconic IGN moments (yes,  that meme), this 1-on-1 dives into what it's like building the world’s biggest gaming site as a lifelong Nintendo fan.

00:00:00 - Intro 
00:00:47 - The Early Days
00:16:35 - The Big Leap of the Nintendo 64
00:26:05 - Reviewing The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
00:36:04 - The Gamecube Era
00:43:00 - Covering The Legend of Zelda: Windwaker
00:52:48 - Becoming The Reaction Guys
00:59:35 - The Wii and the Nintendo DS
01:03:16 - Experiencing the Nintendo 3DS
01:09:19 - Wii U: The Dark Ages
01:15:30 - The Launch of Amiibo
01:18:20 - The Nintendo 2DS
01:22:05 - The Success of the Nintendo Switch
01:29:18 - The Dawn of the Nintendo Switch 2 & What's Next
01:43:25 - Outro
title: NES to Switch 2: 40 Years of Nintendo with IGN's Founder - NVC Special

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Atomfall gameplay overview trailer for the Wicked Isle DLC, coming June 3. 

The Atomfall story continues with the “Wicked Isle” Story Expansion Pack, introducing a new location, enemies, quests, characters, items, weapons, and more.

Surrounded by murky and perilous waters lies the Wicked Isle… a mysterious new region to explore, nestled off the Cumberland coast. They say there was a creepy old fishing village out there, but the locals haven’t seen anyone from there for years.

There is a boat from the Wyndham Village shore for anyone brave enough to go and look for themselves. New mysteries, new supplies and new possibilities of escape could lie ahead for anyone who dares.
title: Atomfall: Wicked Isle - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: After playing several hours of the opening of Hell is Us along with some mid-game dungeon crawling, I came away with a clearer idea of developer Rogue Factor's new-weird-influenced take on an action-adventure game that pushes players to mind the finer details of the world and maintain poise during some of the intense engagements. So far, it's a game that makes charting out into a familiar yet deeply alien world feel captivating. Previewed by Alessandro Fillari
title: Hell is Us Brings a 'New-Weird' Approach to the Sci-Fi Action-RPG

author: IGN
title: Where to find the crests in Elden Ring Nightreign's Mage Towers

author: IGN
title: Why fans think Thor is dying in Avengers: Doomsday

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Electronic Arts has cancelled its solo Black Panther game and shuttered the developer, Cliffhanger Games. EA is doing some cost-cutting elsewhere, as well, with around 300 roles affected across multiple teams. It's another blow to an already tumultuous industry where AAA gaming with big IPs usually mean skyrocketing costs. In other news, work on Cyberpunk 2 has officially started over at CD Projekt. The game will be a sequel to Cyberpunk 2077, which infamously had a pretty rocky launch on last-gen consoles back in 2020. However, most of the company is still hard at work on The Witcher 4, which does not yet have a release date. And finally, the Switch 2 officially launches in the U.S. next week, but already the console is getting into the hands of the public. A Russian blogger apparently was able to buy one and have it shipped early, but without the Day 1 update, the unit is useless. And over at Target, a whole bunch of Switch 2's were rolled out in a lock-up cage
title: EA's Black Panther Cancelled, 3 Marvel Games Still In Development - IGN Daily Fix
